definition: Jingzhou prefecture-level city on Changjiang in Hubei

prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Jingzhou prefecture-level city on Changjiang in Hubei
to lose Jingzhou due to carelessness (idiom)/to suffer a major setback due to negligence

sentences.english: Zhao Zilong reported to you that Jingzhou is facing danger, you wanna go back, so you came up with this idea.
sentences.chinese: 方纔趙子龍報說荊州危急，你欲還鄉，故推此意。

sentences.english: Objective To sdutyu on the flies fauna in Jingzhou City.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究荊州市區蠅類的區系。

sentences.english: Since escaping the Jingzhou catastrophe, I've been recuperating at Bao Hamlet.
sentences.chinese: 自荊州失陷，逃難在鮑家莊養病。

sentences.english: " Later, because of the "Jingzhou", said the thrust-weight people in already.
sentences.chinese: 後因以“荊州”稱己所推重之士。

sentences.english: Predictably, the Jingzhou government's reaction to the kneeling professors was less than enthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 可以料到，荊州政府對於下跪教授的迴應並不積極。

sentences.english: People in JingZhou are proud of the Ancient City Wall.
This Lunar New Year's Day, and his party boarded the four time the plane flew to Jingzhou.
sentences.chinese: 這樣大年初一，一行四人準時登上了飛往荊州的專機。

sentences.english: Jingzhou is the origin of Chinese dragon boat culture.
sentences.chinese: 荊州是中國龍舟文化的發源地。

sentences.english: There are total 61 overpasses in construction drawings design for Hubei Xiangfan-Jinzhou Expressway.
sentences.chinese: 湖北襄樊至荊州高速公路施工圖設計中天橋共61座。

sentences.english: In Chu Ping period, Yuan Shu allied himself with Sun Jian to control Nanyang and Yuzhou.
sentences.chinese: 初平年間，袁術與孫堅聯手控制荊州南陽郡與豫州。

sentences.english: You know pretty much about Jingzhou.
I think we should consider sending a man to Jingzhou to substitute for General Guan and bring Guan back before we go into battle.
sentences.chinese: 吾欲酌量着一人去荊州，替回關將軍來，方可敵之。

sentences.english: Some necessary measures were mentioned to deal with the climate change and ensure the food security in Jingzhou.
sentences.chinese: 提出了應對氣候變化，保障荊州糧食安全的必要措施。

sentences.english: See Don Li Bai "and Han Jingzhou."
There are a lot of scenic spots in Jingzhou.

definition: Sun Quan (reigned 222-252), southern warlord and king of state of Wu 吳|吴 in the Three Kingdoms period

Zhuge Liang (181-234), military leader and prime minister of Shu Han 蜀漢|蜀汉 during the Three Kingdoms period/the main hero of the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义, where he is portrayed as a sage and military genius/mastermind
Yuan Shao (153-202), general during late Han, subsequently warlord
Guiyang county in Chenzhou 郴州[Chen1 zhou1], Hunan
the state of Chu, one of the most important of the small states contending for power in China between 770 and 223 BC, located around present-day Hubei
